channel.title: Webclient java version issue?
channel.description:
I made a webclient, and in the run.bat i had:
[code]@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java" -Xmx300m -cp . Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
and when my friend tried to load the webclient he get's this
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rhvt1.png[/img]
and he only has jre6, is there anyway i can make it so player's can have any version?

item.title: Webclient java version issue?
item.dc:creator: @24jared24 24jared24
item.description:
@24jared24 wrote:

I made a webclient, and in the run.bat i had:

@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java" -Xmx300m -cp . Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

and when my friend tried to load the webclient he get’s this

rhvt1.png767×501

and he only has jre6, is there anyway i can make it so player’s can have any version?
